feed.title: S-ENDA Playground
feed.subtitle: This is the playground website for the S-ENDA project at NIVA. Here we list technologies we are exploring in order to make our data Findable, Accessible, Interoperable, and Reusable.

entry.title: The Playground so far
entry.content:
So far we worked on a bunch of scripts to play with technologies relevant for S-ENDA

In catalog you find some sample scripts to play with ogc(mostly csw) and xsdata.

In collection there is a set of Postman collections to interact with csw services.

In hello-xarray there are some samples to work with xarray and trying to follow cf-convention.
entry.summary: So far we worked on a bunch of scripts to play with technologies relevant for S-ENDA
